<a id="class_CheckButton"></a>

# CheckButton

**Inherits:** [Button](class_button.md) **<** [BaseButton](class_basebutton.md) **<** [Control](class_control.md) **<** [CanvasItem](class_canvasitem.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A button that represents a binary choice.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**CheckButton** is a toggle button displayed as a check field. It's similar to [CheckBox](class_checkbox.md) in functionality, but it has a different appearance. To follow established UX patterns, it's recommended to use **CheckButton** when toggling it has an **immediate** effect on something. For example, it can be used when pressing it shows or hides advanced settings, without asking the user to confirm this action.

See also [BaseButton](class_basebutton.md) which contains common properties and methods associated with this node.

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="class_CheckButton_theme_color_button_checked_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](class_color.md) **button_checked_color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckButton_theme_color_button_checked_color)

The color of the checked icon when the checkbox is pressed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckButton_theme_color_button_unchecked_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](class_color.md) **button_unchecked_color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckButton_theme_color_button_unchecked_color)

The color of the unchecked icon when the checkbox is not pressed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckButton_theme_constant_check_v_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](class_int.md) **check_v_offset** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckButton_theme_constant_check_v_offset)

The vertical offset used when rendering the toggle icons (in pixels).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckButton_theme_icon_checked"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **checked** [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckButton_theme_icon_checked)

The icon to display when the **CheckButton** is checked (for left-to-right layouts).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckButton_theme_icon_checked_disabled"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **checked_disabled** [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckButton_theme_icon_checked_disabled)

The icon to display when the **CheckButton** is checked and disabled (for left-to-right layouts).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

The icon to display when the **CheckButton** is checked and disabled (for right-to-left layouts).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckButton_theme_icon_checked_mirrored"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **checked_mirrored** [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckButton_theme_icon_checked_mirrored)

The icon to display when the **CheckButton** is checked (for right-to-left layouts).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->
